mapper.select: SELECT mem.userid, userpw, username, enabled, regdate, updatedate, auth, photo, useremail FROM tbl_member mem LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_member_auth auth on mem.userid = auth.userid WHERE mem.userid = #{userid}
select mem.userid, mem.username, mem.useremail, mem.regdate, auth from tbl_member mem left outer join tbl_member_auth auth on mem.userid = auth.userid order by auth
select count(*) from tbl_member where userid=#{userid}
select count(*) from tbl_member where useremail=#{useremail}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (userid, userpw, username, useremail) values (#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{username} , #{useremail})
mapper.update: update tbl_member set userpw = #{userpw} where userid=#{userid}
update tbl_member set photo = #{photo} where userid=#{userid}
update tbl_member_auth set auth = #{auth} where userid=#{userid}
